name: Run4Home (VR)
description:
Run4Home (VR) is a game made during the GlobalGameJam 2019

You are pursued by bad spirits and you need to run to your own home, your heaven. However, you will need to avoid a lot of obstacles on the path.

Credits: 

Kevin (Maus3rSR) : Game designer / developer

Quentin : Level designer / developer

Maurice : Sound maker / Music maker / 3D Assets Designer

Arthur : Game Animations / developer

Pitch of the game (French)
